website_summaries.verdict: A sprayer that does a good job of misting the oil at a decent price.
pros: Can spray oils as well as other kitchen liquids
Stainless steel makes it easy to take outside
Company offers a lifetime warranty guarantee
cons: This model does not come with instructions for cleaning or using

customer_reviews.title: So far so good..
customer_reviews.text: I literally received this today. So far so good...its heavyweight, feels like it could hold up for awhile. Looks like a pretty simple item to take apart and clean, the only thing I didn't like was it DID NOT COME WITH ANY INSTRUCTIONS! I mean, it is just a simple piece but some washing instructions would have been nice....like top rack dishwasher or bottom? can i put the spray nozzle in the dishwasher or wash by hand? how would i unclog it if it ever clogs? and so on.....I haven't used it yet.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money
customer_reviews.text: Was eager to try this. The first time I used it it didn’t even spray it just squirted out in one spot. Like a squirt gun squirting straight ahead. Very disappointed and will be returning
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Very good
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to help with my daily cooking and this has been a god sent! I don't have to worry about oil spilling onto my hand and making everything oily any mote. Heat up the pan and just spray. Cooking with oil has never been easier
customer_reviews.author: Sammie

customer_reviews.title: So so
customer_reviews.text: I would have loved to have love it. I don’t think these are for me
customer_reviews.author: Jo K

customer_reviews.title: It actually sprays.
customer_reviews.text: It actually sprays, for the price I was sckeptical but I already bought a second. Only have had it 2 weeks but can't beat the price or quality.
customer_reviews.author: Juicy.jpg

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: leaks terrible...I felt so bad, I gave one as a gift and kept one for the hubs.
customer_reviews.author: Jfidel

customer_reviews.title: It sprays too much oil
customer_reviews.text: I bought it to mist oil on food for in my air fryer but it doesn't mist it squirts. Too much oil. Actually I pitched it.
customer_reviews.author: Alma Keys to w

customer_reviews.title: leeks does not sprya
customer_reviews.text: Product was used for olive oil, what a waist of money, it leakes and does not spray. will not buy this name of product ever again.
customer_reviews.author: millie

customer_reviews.title: works great. purchased a glass sprayer and it hit the ...
customer_reviews.text: works great. purchased a glass sprayer and it hit the counter and cracked. this one was perfect!
customer_reviews.author: ebn029

customer_reviews.title: which is dirty and gross
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes the oil gets on the steel outside of the spray hole, which is dirty and gross.
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: Excellent addition to any kitchen or grill
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this Stainless Steel Spray canister. I filled it with a high grade blend of avocado / coconut / safflower oil and this sprayer produces an excellent mist for pan frying or covering the grill surface before grilling. It appears very well made and being stainless steel and black it is sleek and stylish. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Drew's Reviews

customer_reviews.title: worked perfect when I placed some warm water
customer_reviews.text: PURCHASED THIS PRODUCT ABOUT 8 MONTHS AGO....worked perfect when I placed some warm water.decided to take it out of the draw and filled it with EXPENSIVE OLIVE OIL (Almost impossible to tell when it is full)..used it once sprayed fine placed it in the fridge to keep the oil from spoiling a week later took it out to spritz a pan and low and behold it spurted out small STREAM of oil...repeatedly tried to get it to spray but all I got was small gobs of OIL ..GONE FOREVER was that fine mist all I get our little gobs of oil....DO NOT BUY!
customer_reviews.author: angelo a gargiulo
